name: Brock
description: Brock is the Pewter City Gym Leader and specializes in Rock-type Pokémon. He is known for his calm demeanor and strong sense of responsibility.

name: Misty
description: Misty is the Cerulean City Gym Leader and specializes in Water-type Pokémon. She is a strong and confident trainer with a passion for aquatic Pokémon.

name: Ash Ketchum
description: Ash is a Pokémon Trainer from Pallet Town who dreams of becoming a Pokémon Master. He is known for his determination and strong bond with his Pokémon.

name: May
description: May is a Pokémon Trainer and Coordinator from Petalburg City. She dreams of becoming a top Pokémon Coordinator and is known for her cheerful and adventurous personality.

name: Dawn
description: Dawn is a Pokémon Trainer and Coordinator from Twinleaf Town. She is known for her determination and passion for Pokémon Contests.

name: Serena
description: Serena is a Pokémon Trainer and Performer from Vaniville Town. She dreams of becoming a Pokémon Queen and is known for her elegance and charm.

name: Cynthia
description: Cynthia is the Champion of the Sinnoh Region. She is known for her intelligence, strength, and her iconic Garchomp.

name: Nurse Joy
description: Nurse Joy is a kind and caring nurse who heals Pokémon at Pokémon Centers across the regions.

name: Whitney
description: Whitney is the Goldenrod City Gym Leader and specializes in Normal-type Pokémon. She is known for her infamous Miltank.

name: Grace
description: Grace is Serena's mother and a former Rhyhorn racer. She is supportive of Serena's journey as a Pokémon Trainer.

name: Skyla
description: Skyla is the Mistralton City Gym Leader and specializes in Flying-type Pokémon. She is also a skilled pilot.

name: Jessie
description: Jessie is a member of Team Rocket, known for her dramatic flair and determination to capture rare Pokémon.

name: James
description: James is a member of Team Rocket, known for his loyalty to his Pokémon and his comedic personality.

name: Lusamine
description: Lusamine is the president of the Aether Foundation. She is known for her obsession with Ultra Beasts.

name: Elesa
description: Elesa is the Nimbasa City Gym Leader and specializes in Electric-type Pokémon. She is also a famous model.

name: Nessa
description: Nessa is the Hulbury Gym Leader and specializes in Water-type Pokémon. She is also a model and a strong battler.

name: Professor Ivy
description: Professor Ivy is a Pokémon Professor who studies Pokémon in the Orange Archipelago.

name: Delia Ketchum
description: Delia Ketchum is Ash's mother. She is supportive of Ash's journey and is known for her kind and caring nature.

name: Officer Jenny
description: Officer Jenny is a dedicated police officer who works to maintain peace and order in the Pokémon world.
